title: Elemantor Page Builder
alt: Elementor is the fastest, most intuitive editor in WordPress. Simply drag, drop and customize.

title: Redux Framework
alt: The most powerful, flexible, and complete WordPress interface and panel builder ever!

title: Customizer
alt: Abstrak comes with a live color customizer. So that you can make changes and see them in Front View.

title: Gutenberg Support
alt: The new Gutenberg has replaced the classic editor. It offers a new to create block-based functionality to create posts and pages in WordPress. You’ll have Gutenberg's support for the theme.

title: Full Demo With One Click Installation
alt: One-click demo installation features you can easily get the site look demo in just 5 min.

title: WooCommerce Support
alt: The most customizable eCommerce platform for building your online business.

title: Responsive Layout
alt: All the pages of this theme are responsive. We used Bootstrap 5.x framework to build the website. It’s the best in class.

title: Mobile-Optimized
alt: A mobile-optimized site is a far more advanced website. Mobile optimized means that the site will reformat itself for a list of handheld or tablet devices.
